corporateOverview.title: Corporate Overview
corporateOverview.description: Reli Group s.r.o. is a European company headquartered in the Czech Republic.
corporateOverview.description1: Originally established as a distributor of solar panel solutions, we built our foundation in the highly regulated and competitive energy sector.
corporateOverview.valuesTitle: Through our experience we developed strong focus on:
corporateOverview.afterText: These values have positioned Reli Group s.r.o. as a trusted and stable partner for businesses across several markets.

transformation.title: Strategic Transformation
transformation.description: In response to the fast-evolving digital economy, Reli Group s.r.o. initiated a strategic transformation:
transformation.desc1: from a specialized distribution company to a modern digital commerce platform.
transformation.insightsTitle: The shift followed clear market insights:

insights.salesChannels: businesses require efficient and credible online sales channels
insights.transparency: modern marketplaces often lack transparency toward their sellers
insights.discipline: companies need platforms that operate with the discipline of a

transformation.result: Leveraging our operational expertise and technology investments, we developed Marketplace Reli (www.reli.one), a next-generation marketplace designed to support businesses of all sizes.

marketplace.title: Reli.one Marketplace
marketplace.subtitle: Reli.one is a multi-category online marketplace built on principles that reflect our corporate heritage:

reliability.title: Operational Reliability
reliability.text: A robust platform designed with precision and process orientation used in industrial distribution.

transparency.title: Transparent Business Environment
transparency.text: Clear conditions, predictable fees, and no unexpected changes. Sellers operate with confidence and long-term visibility.
transparency.text1: Sellers operate with confidence and long-term visibility.

infrastructure.title: Scalable Digital Infrastructure
infrastructure.text: Secure payments, automated systems, detailed analytics, and integrated business tools - all designed for professional use.

partnership.title: Partnership - Driven Approach
partnership.text: We build long-term relationships with sellers, supporting their growth and treating them as strategic partners.

valueForSellers.title: Value for Sellers

items.reach: expanded market reach across the EU region
items.platform: professionally managed platform prioritizing quality and reliability
items.tools: growth-enabling tools: product insights, sales analytics, and promotional features

valueForSellers.goal: Our goal is to create a marketplace ecosystem where sellers can operate efficiently, scale sustainably, and focus on what they do best - building their business.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: Reli Group s.r.o. is committed to establishing Reli.one as a leading European digital marketplace built on trust, operational excellence, and business integrity.
vision.text1: We aim to connect businesses, brands, and creators with customers through a platform reflecting professional standards and long-term strategic thinking.

positioning.title: Reli.one - A Marketplace Built by a Business with Real Experience
positioning.text: Our history in the solar energy sector taught us the value of precision, compliance, and reliability.
positioning.text1: These values now define our marketplace.
positioning.text2: Sellers who partner with Reli.one gain access to a platform built not on speculation, but on experience, structure, and corporate discipline.
